channel.title: St Louis on Life At The Circus
channel.description: Recent content in St Louis on Life At The Circus

item.title: Our Half Life Anniversary Excursion
item.description: Scott and I started dating our senior year of high school, when we were both 17. A few years ago we were out for an anniversary date and realized that we were approaching the point in our life when we would have been together as much of our life as we weren’t together. We decided we wanted to celebrate such a momentous occasion and so we (and by we, I really mean Scott) calculated out when exactly that would be… our dates are different since we don’t share the same birthday.
